# Old Warden Aerodrome

Old Warden Aerodrome  is located  east southeast of Bedford, in Bedfordshire, England. The privately owned aerodrome serves The Shuttleworth Collection, which contains a large working collection of vintage aircraft, cars, motor cycles and agricultural vehicles and equipment.
The airfield is home to the Cambridge Flying Group, who operate two de Havilland Tiger Moth aircraft, G-AHIZ and G-AOEI.
External links
* Up-to-date airfield information including the ability to PPR is available on [https://oldwardenaerodrome.co.uk/ The Old Warden Aerodrome website].
